text: ko'i manavina hrdayamam allaha'e be hrdaya nathi mukya ane potani je patni'one tame “ma” kahi che, teni'one allaha'e tamari mata'o nathi banavi ane na tamara mate dattaka balakone tamara putro banavya, a to tamari potani vato che, allaha ta'ala satya vata kahe che ane te satya marga batave che
